channel.title: Attack animation switches
channel.description: Alright, so i'm 99% sure this is client sided, but for example, you attack with a whip and switch to a secondary weapon you would instantly change to that weapon and still do the whip attack animation. instead of just your character standing still. Anyone know where this would be located. Thanks in advance

item.title: Attack animation switches
item.dc:creator: @hi_im_bamf hi im bamf
item.description:
@hi_im_bamf wrote:

yes but only until that first animation is done then itll attack regularly.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack animation switches
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

He probably means, when u are attacking with a whip and switch fast to an Armadyl Godsword, the godsword will have the same animation and speed attack as the whip.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack animation switches
item.dc:creator: @hi_im_bamf hi im bamf
item.description:
@hi_im_bamf wrote:

In a sense yes, if they switch their weapon really quick it’ll still be doing the whip animation instead of stopping it completely. If you still don’t know what you mean i’ll show you a video

Read full topic

item.title: Attack animation switches
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Server sided… But what are you wanting? You want a player to do the whip animation without wielding a whip?

Read full topic
